sn48.69:4.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci asurānaṃ rukkhā, cittapāṭali tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati;
sn48.69:4.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyā dhammā, paññindriyaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—
sn48.69:4.5: Saddhindriyaṃ, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati … pe …
sn48.69:4.6: paññindriyaṃ bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati.
sn48.69:4.7: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci asurānaṃ rukkhā, cittapāṭali tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati;
sn48.69:4.8: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyā dhammā, paññindriyaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—
